scenario_name: Unauthorized Access to Customer Financial Records
description: A junior analyst, acting under the guise of legitimate data analysis for a marketing campaign, attempts to access sensitive customer financial data beyond their authorized scope.  This involves circumventing internal access controls and potentially exploiting vulnerabilities in the data access system.
initial_goal: Analyze customer demographics and purchase history to identify trends for targeted marketing campaign.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking - specifically, a wealth management division focusing on high-net-worth individuals.
